item.description:
Hey Everyone please lace up your dancin' shoes and come on out and Zumba for Autism!   Join 10 of Boston's my fabulous instructors at this HUGE event on Tuesday, May 22 6:30-9pm at New England's largest Austim organization, Melmark New England in Andover, MA.   Let's join together for our children!   Flyers are available and registration is open!   ...and thanks for spreading the word!   https://www.facebook.com/events/216947788406522/

 

Registration and Raffles: 6:30 7:00pm

Zumba Event with a team of fabulous guest instructors: 7:00 - 9:00pm  

 

Melmark New England is a division of Melmark, Inc. a private, not-for-profit, community-based organization. Melmark New England provides services to children with autism spectrum disorders in a clinically proficient environment of warmth, care and respect.   

Please see www.amyfournierhealthandfitness.com for more info

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: COME TO THE BIGGEST ZUMBA FOR AUTISM EVENT TO HIT NEW ENGLAND!
